pr_title: Add symmetric encryption support for Crypto Util

timeline.message: Add symmetric encryption support for Crypto Util

timeline.author: malithie
malithie

replies.bodyText: This was due to using old wso2 check style. Fixed with 004c781.
replies.author: denuwanthi

timeline.bodyText: What if this method is utilized in 'getDefaultEncryptionAlgorithm' rather than passing an additional boolean
timeline.author: malithie

replies.bodyText:
Since we use this variable at https://github.com/wso2/carbon-kernel/pull/2636/files#diff-8b0422c9fd8f481b4c8261829499efe4R161 also, I defined it seperately. If use this inside the getDefaultEncryptionAlgorithm method, it is not accessible in https://github.com/wso2/carbon-kernel/pull/2636/files#diff-8b0422c9fd8f481b4c8261829499efe4R161.
We can declare an instance variable and assign to it in getDefaultEncryptionAlgorithm also. Instead I went with this approach.
replies.author: denuwanthi

timeline.bodyText: Did we verify this will not have an impact on previously encrypted data for asymmetric flow
timeline.author: malithie

replies.bodyText: I think, during migration effort we can handle this. When there are previously encrypted data on asymmetric , we will have to do a migration anyway. This can also be handled from there i think.
replies.author: denuwanthi

timeline.bodyText: Let's deprecate CipherHolder class as well
timeline.author: malithie

timeline.bodyText:
I guess this will not apply as we will now have it in crypto service layer.
Still keep a note and verify
